PREVIEW

THE CHAIR

PREVIEW

PROCESS

DESCRIPTION

An inherited office chair from my sister.

It did have wheels and could roll without the trucks, but the trucks do add a particularly "skate" quality to it.

STEPS

This is a pretty standard desk chair. This belonged to my sister from when she was in undergrad.

My early plans for this project were using this chair. I took my drill to it, mutilated it, slapped some duct tape and trucks to the bottom, and said, "look! this is gonna be a thesis project!"
